ValidationRule.description: Validates if Email, Payment Method and Airport are set
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( COMM_IsPartner__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Partner')) ), AND( COMM_IsPartner__c, ISBLANK(COMM_PaymentMethod__c) ), AND( COMM_IsPartner__c, ISBLANK(COMM_Airport__c) ), AND( COMM_IsPartner__c, ISBLANK(COMM_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fill in the Email, Payment Method and Airport fields and check if type is Partner.
